storyline: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the caped crusader must come to terms with one of the greatest psychological tests of his ability to fight injustice.
title: The Dark Knight

storyline: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s everyday at midnight.
title: Midnight in Paris

storyline: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
title: Avatar

storyline: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Commander Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful, time-traveling Romulan creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.
title: Star Trek

storyline: A former Special Forces operative turned mercenary is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers, adopting the alter ego Deadpool.
title: Deadpool

storyline: An All-American trucker gets dragged into a centuries-old mystical battle in Chinatown.
title: Big Trouble in Little China

storyline: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.
title: Inside Out

storyline: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.
title: Ratatouille

storyline: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.
title: Toy Story

storyline: After being kicked out of a rock band, Dewey Finn becomes a substitute teacher of a strict elementary private school, only to try and turn it into a rock band.
title: School of Rock

storyline: A city teenager moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.
title: Footloose

storyline: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, the Dark Knight, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his imposed exile to save Gotham City, now on the edge of total annihilation, from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.
title: The Dark Knight Rises

storyline: An FBI agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.
title: Miss Congeniality

storyline: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.
title: House of Cards
